translation: I believe all that You have said to me to be true, O Krishna; indeed, O blessed Lord! Neither the gods nor the demons know Your manifestation (origin).
commentary: 10.14 All all? This this? Ritam true? I think (I) think? that which? me to me? Vadasi (Thou) sayest? Keshav O Krishna? Not not? Hi verily? And Thy? Lord O blessed Lord? Person manifestation? Viduá¸¥ know? Gods gods? Not not? The demons are demons.Commentary Bhagavan is He? in whom ever exist the six attributes in their fullness? viz.? Jnana (wisdom)? Vairagya (dispassion)? Aisvarya (lordship)? Dharma (virtue)?
